column4: erm. how do I figure out what package contains a library or file I am hunting down?
if it is installed, dpkg -S file; if not, you can install apt-file, apt-file update then apt-file search file;
you can do either (apt-get dist-upgrade; or apt-get install linux-image-virtual linux-virtual;) the second is mostly if you have other upgrades that you don't currently want to install
